intro: ^So tell me. Did August commit suicide?
yes_suicide: ^I never even knew that he was struggling. God damn it. August....Erika, I am so, so sorry.
^I don’t know what to say. I'm sorry. If there’s anything I can do for you, let me know.
^I'm going to leave now, if that's alright.

reason_1: ^August is left handed, but he died of a gunshot wound to the right side of his head.

^Oh my God. You’re right. He is left handed. He wears his watch on his right wrist, he always has a huge ink smudge on the left side of his left hand, I’ve seen him writing a billion f*cking times…I didn’t even notice.
^I’ve been up since 2… I must have been so tired that I missed it.
^One moment—let me consult the report—yes, here it is. "He was found with the gun in his right hand".
^So that settles it. Not knowing that he was left handed, someone shot August at close range and manipulated the scene to make it look like a suicide.
